channel.title: Need help with login spawn!
channel.description:
Hey i have just made my server and i really need help with changing the "Spawn" Point like when someone joins "A new guy" I want him to spawn in varrock big bank ! Can anyone please help me were i shall put the commands etc ~ I dont have any commands so i need them, and i really need to know were i shall edit and stuff.
I run a 562!
